compliance_assessment.framework_description: General Data Protection Regulation, a regulation in EU law on data protection and privacy.

requirements.requirement: Obtain explicit consent from users for data processing.
requirements.evidence: User consent is obtained during account registration.

requirements.requirement: Implement data protection by design and by default.
requirements.evidence: Some services implement encryption, but not all data flows are secured.
recommendations: Standardize encryption practices across all data flows.

requirements.requirement: Ensure users can access, rectify, and delete their data.
requirements.evidence: Users can request data deletion, but the process is not fully automated.
gaps: Manual process for data deletion requests.
recommendations: Automate the data deletion process to enhance user experience.

critical_gaps: Manual process for data deletion requests.
remediation_plan: Standardize encryption practices across all data flows.
Automate the data deletion process to enhance user experience.
